labels.name: story
labels.value: Verify That You Are Able To Change Or Reorder A Previously Added Product

name: Validate_You_Are_Able_To_Change_Or_Reorder_Previously_Added_Product
description:
Test Steps:

1- Goto http://live.techpanda.org/
2- Click On My Account Link
3- Login In Application Using Previously Created Credential
4- Click On 'Reorder' Link, Change Qty & Click Update
5- Verify Grand Total Is Changed
6- Complete Billing & Shipping Information
7- Verify Order Is Generated And Note The Order Number Qty - 10.

Expected Result:

- Grand Total Is Changed
- Order Number Is Generated

Actual Result:

1) Grand Total Is Changed Successfully
2) Order Number Is Generated Successfully

Priority:

- High
